drive_click.wav
drive_snatch.wav
drive_spin.wav
drive_spinnd.wav
drive_startup.wav

are part of the WinUAE project

drive_snatch.wav and drive_spinnd.wav aren't used in Steem

drive_seek.wav is another free sample

_ST files were also downloaded from WinUAE site.
_edit files were somehow treated.

  If you can please sample some more realistic Atari sounds and upload 
  them at atari-forum. Please don't rip SainT's samples.
